name: Fyrus (Autoghost)
author: ywkls
info: A boss who looks like a Goron on fire and has larges chains to pelt you with.Sprites based on work by Master Maniac.
description: Creates the main boss, plus two circling chains and a third that tries to head towards you. As his HP drops, he moves faster; the chains circle faster and the projectile is fired more often.
setup: Assign chain sprite graphics to a slot and change variable to match that slot.Requiresstd.zhstring.zhghost.zh
